report.report_title: Evidence-grounded summary for Author case AUT_001
report.summary: This case was triaged for human review due to cross-document inconsistencies that may indicate a name-collision (multiple individuals sharing the same name string). The system observed: High affiliation variability, Multiple countries observed, High cluster ambiguity (entropy). All statements below are grounded in extracted evidence identifiers.
key_points: - Same name string appears across distinct institutions and countries (see E01101, E01102, E01103, E01104)
- Multiple countries observed across documents (see E01101, E01102, E01103, E01104)
- Potential entity-resolution ambiguity: multiple candidate clusters for the same name (see E01105)
report.no_claims_notice: This report surfaces review cues and does not assert wrongdoing or identity.
